about_the_game:
A new test for the demon Zexus! The murder of the king of hell did not go unnoticed, and God himself took notice. He offered the demon to take the place of the king of hell in order to restore the balance between heaven and hell, but Zexus refused. The price for a daring refusal is the end of all things.
Cemetery Warrior 6 is a dynamic 3D shooter from the first person, with incendiary Heavy Metal! Once again go through severe trials, playing as the demon Zexus! Use demonic abilities - such as instant movement and fire breathing, as well as firearm potential! After each level, upgrade your abilities to become stronger and defeat the five Lords who guard the death star that is about to destroy everything!

- Several types of weapons: shotgun, grenade launcher, machine gun!
- 20 levels of crazy Heavy Metal!
- Various locations with different monsters: Dungeon, golden caves, hellish labyrinth!
- 5 strongest bosses!
- Magic system: use fire breath, healing, or acceleration!

content_descriptors.notes: Monsters can explode with bloody splashes.

name: Cemetery Warrior 6

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: i3 10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1660Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: i3 12100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cemetery Warrior 6 is a dynamic 3D shooter from the first person, with incendiary Heavy Metal
